section_details.title: Listening Part 1: Global Comprehension
section_details.instructions_de: Sie hören nun fünf kurze Texte. Dazu sollen Sie fünf Aufgaben lösen. Sie hören diese Texte nur einmal. Entscheiden Sie beim Hören, ob die Aussagen richtig (+) oder falsch (-) sind.
section_details.instructions_en: You will now hear five short texts. You should solve five tasks. You will hear these texts only once. Decide while listening whether the statements are correct (+) or false (-).
section_details.instructions_ar: ستسمع الآن خمس نصوص قصيرة. يجب أن تحل خمس عمليات. ستسمع هذه النصوص فقط مرة واحدة. قرر أثناء الاستماع إذا كانت البيانات صحيحة (+) أو خاطئة (-).
section_details.instructions_ru: Вы сейчас услышите пять коротких текстов. Вам нужно решить пять задач. Вы услышите эти тексты только один раз. Решите, слушая, являются ли утверждения правильными (+) или неправильными (-).
section_details.instructions_fr: Vous entendrez maintenant cinq textes courts. Vous devez résoudre cinq tâches. Vous entendrez ces textes une seule fois. Décidez en écoutant si les affirmations sont correctes (+) ou incorrectes (-).
section_details.instructions_es: Escucharás ahora cinco textos cortos. Debes resolver cinco tareas. Escucharás estos textos solo una vez. Decide mientras escuchas si las afirmaciones son correctas (+) o incorrectas (-).

statements.statement: The electronics company is refusing to give money back to customers who bought the defective phone.
Scientists have confirmed that the newly discovered planet definitely has an atmosphere.
The availability of food in the city is one reason the falcons have moved there.
The student was caught because the mannequin's speaker failed to answer during the roll call.
The study suggests that having plants in the office can improve how well employees focus.
The scooter company Swift Scooters was forced to recall their products after several customers were seriously injured.
Although the meteor shower happens every year, this year's event is expected to be more intense than usual.
Biological experts have confirmed that the animal in the video is definitely a Tasmanian Tiger.
The man was caught because the parking space he painted did not look exactly like an official one.
Elena Ross uses her architectural skills to help elderly people improve their mental sharpness.
The company is offering customers a choice between their money back or a new device.
Experts believe the early arrival of the birds will result in a higher survival rate for the chicks.
Construction work on the new building has been stopped to investigate the discovery.
The woman painted the road markings herself using paint she bought online.
Sarah Jenkins believes that her gardening program improves employee performance at work.
